volunteer_experience.info: I am in the survey team and go on-field to gather information from people about their day to day life problems. After all,  Interacting with people is the best way to understand their problems.- won bronze medal in Nukkad( Street play ) held among 15 NSS units.Programming Implementation in NSS: Used python to read excel files and translate the data from one language to another to be used as reference study material for school children which would have otherwise taken days to do.

projects: [{"title":"Chess Engine","start_date":"Nov 2021","end_date":"Jan 2022","description":"- Created a Chess game using pygame library.- Created an engine to play the game using minimax algorithm.- Created a CNN to predict the best move given state of board."},{"title":"BuildWithUs","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"\"Build With Us\" is a Resume Building website. Build your resume by adding data in placeholdersAfter you are done creating your resume. You can download it in a pdf format."},{"title":"CMD Pokemon","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"It is a terminal based Pokemon game written in python. It is a comprehensive implementation of Object Oriented Programming concepts and has almost all features present in a graphical game.Features:- Travelling around map and catching wild pokemons.- Defeating other pokemons to gain experience and level up. - Levelling up enables pokemons to learn new attacks and evolve to stronger pokemons.- Defeating gym leaders to earn gym badges. - 8 badges will allow you to participate in Indigo League and a chance to have name in hall of fame.- Encounter with legendary pokemons that are undefeatable."},{"title":"Sum of Palindromes","start_date":"Aug 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"\"Sum of Palindromes\" is an implementation of a research paper which states that every positive integer can be broken into a sum of three palindromic numbers in every base > 5 and then describes the algorithm to break the number.The program can either be run in command line where It shows the sub-algorithms that the number goes through in the process and shows the runtime and validity of the program. A brute force method is also available which can be used as a reference to compare the speed of both programs.There is also a flask based web version which uses the same program to calculate the result, but instead of showing output to console, it gives a nice GUI to give values and see output."},{"title":"Ask Me Now","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Php based quizzing app where you can login and start quizzing with 4 difficulty levels. Features:- Tracker to start the quiz from the level where user last logged out.- A summary of the quiz after the submission to check the marked answers, correct answers, passing marks and total score.- A paginated leader board with all the users arranged on the basis of Total Score, and then on basis of Score on individual levels and username respectively."}]
